title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-9.5 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-9.5 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements

State Regulations

The following criteria apply to both registered and
permitted facilities: (a) The facility
must keep records in accordance with subdivision
360.19
(k) of this

Title. In addition to the requirements of section
360.19
of this Title, all NDM
handling and recovery facilities must maintain daily records of the quantity
and destination of NDM received at and sent from the facility by material
classification, including the quantity and destination of material used as
alternative operating cover as described in section
363-6.21
of this Title. (b) The facility must submit an annual report
as required by paragraph 360.19(k)(3) of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-9.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
